title: search_unified
description: Search emails, events, and files simultaneously with optional cache controls.

query.description: Search phrase trimmed of surrounding whitespace.

account_id.description: Microsoft account identifier used to scope the search.

entity_types.description: Optional subset of entity types to search; defaults to all when omitted.

anyOf.description: Array of entity types; order is preserved but internally normalized.

limit.description: Maximum number of results returned per entity type.

use_cache.description: Whether cached results may be used if available.

force_refresh.description: Bypass cache and force a fresh search when true.
